content.raw:
Reset World/Ctrl-r does not reset the position of the Spacenav, causing the arm to jump back to the last commanded Spacenav position after a reset.

Steps to reproduce:

Move the arm using the Spacenav.

Press Edit >> Reset World or Ctrl-r. You should see the arm move back to its original position.

Move the arm with the Spacenav again. It will jump back to the last commanded position.
